text.name: Draw of the Sword
text.desc:
[StartBattle] Apply 1 [BladeResultUpTier1] to (highest A-Reson.) other Blade Lineage allies in ascending order of Speeds (slowest to fastest, 2 times max)
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Breath] Count

text.name: Draw of the Sword
text.desc:
[StartBattle_Force] <color=#EBCAA2>Apply 1 [BladeResultUpTier1] to (highest A-Reson.) other Blade Lineage allies in ascending order of Speeds (slowest to fastest, 2 times max)</color>
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Breath] Count

text.name: Draw of the Sword
text.desc:
At 5+ [Breath], Coin Power +1
[StartBattle] Apply 1 [BladeResultUpTier1] to (highest A-Reson.) other Blade Lineage allies in ascending order of Speeds (slowest to fastest, 2 times max)
- If there are 6 or more allied Blade Lineage Identities in the Encounter, apply 2 instead
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Breath] Count

text.name: Acupuncture
text.desc:
[StartBattle] Apply 1 [BladeResultUpTier2] to (highest A-Reson.) other Blade Lineage allies in ascending order of Speeds (slowest to fastest, 2 times max)
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Breath] Count
[WinDuel] Gain 1 [SlashResultUp] next turn

text.name: Acupuncture
text.desc:
[StartBattle_Force] <color=#EBCAA2>Apply 1 [BladeResultUpTier2] to (highest A-Reson.) other Blade Lineage allies in ascending order of Speeds (slowest to fastest, 2 times max)</color>
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Breath] Count
[WinDuel] Gain 1 [SlashResultUp] next turn

text.name: Acupuncture
text.desc:
At 7+ [Breath], Coin Power +1
[StartBattle] Apply 1 [BladeResultUpTier2] to (highest A-Reson.) other Blade Lineage allies in ascending order of Speeds (slowest to fastest, 2 times max)
- If there are 6 or more allied Blade Lineage Identities in the Encounter, apply 2 instead
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Breath] Count
[WinDuel] Gain 1 [SlashResultUp] next turn

text.name: Yield My Flesh
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 Aggro to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Until this Skill ends, this unit cannot be Staggered from taking damage
[WinDuel] Gain 5 [Breath]
[DefeatDuel] After getting hit, use 'To Claim Their Bones' Skill
[CriticalActivated] Deal +2% damage on Critical Hit for every [Breath] Potency on self (Max 50%)
+15% Damage on Critical Hit
Deal +0.5% damage per 1% missing HP on self (Max 25%)

text.name: Yield My Flesh
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 Aggro to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Until this Skill ends, this unit cannot be Staggered from taking damage
[WinDuel] Gain 5 [Breath]
[DefeatDuel] After getting hit, use 'To Claim Their Bones' Skill
[CriticalActivated] Deal +3% damage on Critical Hit for every [Breath] Potency on self (Max 75%)
+30% Damage on Critical Hit
Deal +0.5% damage per 1% missing HP on self (Max 25%)

text.name: Overthrow
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [SlashResultUp] next turn (1 time max)
Deal +0.5% damage for every 1% missing HP on self (Max 25%)

text.name: To Claim Their Bones
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] At 10+ [Breath], Atk Weight +1
[WhenUse] Until this Skill ends, this unit cannot be Staggered from taking damage
[WhenUse] Deal +2% damage on Critical Hit for every [Breath] Potency on self (Max 50%)
+20% Damage on Critical Hit
Deal +0.5% damage per 1% missing HP on self (Max 25%)

text.name: To Claim Their Bones
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] For every 7 [Breath] on self, Atk Weight +1 (Max +2)
[WhenUse] Until this Skill ends, this unit cannot be Staggered from taking damage
[WhenUse] Deal +2% damage on Critical Hit for every [Breath] Potency on self (Max 50%)
+30% Damage on Critical Hit
Deal +0.5% damage for every 1% missing HP on self (Max 25%)
If this Skill targets only a single enemy, deal +100% damage (In Focused Encounters, a single Part)

1050801.name: Swordplay of the Homeland
1050801.desc:
In this Encounter, when this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0, nullify that damage; then, this unit's HP cannot drop below 1 for the turn. (Once per Encounter)

When this unit gains [Breath] Potency/Count with its own Skill or Coin effects: give 1 [Breath] Potency and +1 [Breath] Count to 2 other Blade Lineage allies with no [Breath] or with the least [Breath]
- If there are 6 or more Blade Lineage allies participating in this Encounter, give 2 [Breath] Potency and +2 [Breath] Count instead

1050802.name: In Memoriam
1050802.desc:
When 3 or more other Blade Lineage allies are defeated:
- When gaining [Breath] Potency/Count with this unit's own Skills and Coin effects: gain 1 more of each
- When 5 or more other Blade Lineage allies are defeated, gain 2 more of each instead
- Combat Start: Apply [SwordPlayOfTheHomeland] on self

1050811.name: Swordplay of the Homeland
1050811.desc:
In this Encounter, when this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0, nullify that damage; then, this unit's HP cannot drop below 1 for the turn. (Once per Encounter)

When this unit gains [Breath] Potency/Count with its own Skill or Coin effects: give 1 [Breath] Potency and +1 [Breath] Count to 2 other Blade Lineage allies with no [Breath] or with the least [Breath]
- If there are 6 or more Blade Lineage allies participating in this Encounter, give 2 [Breath] Potency and +2 [Breath] Count instead

Combat Start: Apply [SwordPlayOfTheHomeland] buff to all other Blade Lineage allies

1050821.name: Swordplay of the Homeland
1050821.desc: Combat Start: 1 ally with the most [Breath] deals +15% damage on Critical Hit with Slash Skills

main: S1 and S2 buff other Blade Lineage allies' corresponding skills with +1 Power (+2 if 6 Blade Lineage identities are deployed) through {status:BladeResultUpTier1} and {status:BladeResultUpTier2}. A-Reson Blade Lineage allies are buffed and prioritizes slower allies first.

S3 is a negative coin skill that wants to lose clashes because he'll use a much stronger 4-coin high damage skill with atk weight and {status:Paralysis} application after the enemy attacks him. His S3 prevents stagger and he has a 1 time death nullification from his passive so he can pull off his damage skill regardless of how much the enemy's attack damages him.

His passive applies {status:SwordPlayOfTheHomeland} to all Blade Lineage allies when you trigger 3 {keyword:Poise} Res. giving their S1 and S2 coin power, their S3 damage, and all their skills crit damage. His passive also provides {status:Breath} Potency and Count to Blade Lineage allies whenever he gains {status:Breath} himself. He also applies the same effects to himself if enough Blade Lineage allies die.
